Class ColumnLayoutShape

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.AbstractShape
      de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.AbstractLayoutShape
          de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.ColumnLayoutShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustableShape, SequenceShape, Paintable, Shape
public class ColumnLayoutShape
extends AbstractLayoutShape
implements SequenceShape

Organizes shapes in a vertical layout.
